projects.title: Code Karma
projects.description: A motivational open source platform for developers to collaborate with nonprofits.

projects.title: Standup
projects.description: A platform for developers around the world to share their bright and dim bulbs, blocked moments, and interact with other developers in a meaningful way.

projects.title: Angular Todos
projects.description: Add, update, filter and check off todos with this todo app built with Angular.

projects.title: Cheddar Bae Biscuits
projects.description: A single page app using the Google Maps API and the Edamam recipe API to give Cheddar Bay Biscuits the spotlight they deserve.

projects.title: Zoo
projects.description: A fun experiment using vanilla JS constructors and CSS animations to build a 'zoo' of animals with different methods.
